Package com.filehandler

Class FileStats

java.lang.Object
com.filehandler.CHRooted
com.filehandler.FileStats
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileHandler
public class FileStats extends CHRooted
FileStats: Get information about files. This API can get file list, read metadata and do similar operations, NOT involving direct operation on file (like reading, adding, removing or editing). Use FileHandlerAPI for reading, creating, editing or removing files and directories.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • files

      protected File files
      The directory where methods to get information are allowed to be executed.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileStats

      public FileStats()
      Create new 'FileStats' instance with a directory named "filehandler_chroot" from user home directory as isolated directory. If you want to keep some files accessible by API, keep them in the 'files' directory under the CHRoot.

    • FileStats

      public FileStats(String newCHRoot)
      Create new 'FileStats' instance with 'newCHRoot' as isolated directory. If you want to keep some files accessible by API, keep them in the 'files' directory under the CHRoot.
      Parameters:
      newCHRoot - Absolute path to isolated directory for safe API calling.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(String filePath) throws IOException
      Description copied from class: CHRooted
      The custom function to validate the file in the request, to be written according to the requirement of the API.
      Specified by:
      isValid in class CHRooted
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the file relative to 'files' to be checked for the validity of request.
      Returns:
      'true', if the request if valid. 'false', otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - The 'canonical file' checked.

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String filePath)
      Checks if file or directory with 'fileName' exists within 'CHRoot'.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of file or directory to check for existence relative to 'CHRoot';
      Returns:
      'true', if file or directory exists at given path. 'false', otherwise.

    • getFileSize

      public long getFileSize(String filePath)
      Returns the file size in bytes.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of file to get size for.
      Returns:
      File size in bytes, if valid request. -1, otherwise.

    • getInfo

      public FileStats.FileInfo getInfo(String filePath)
      Returns the file metadata.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of file or directory for getting its information.
      Returns:
      The 'FileInfo' object, if the request if valid. 'null', otherwise.

    • getList

      public FileStats.FileInfo[] getList(String filePath)
      Lists all the contents of a directory.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of the directory for getting its contents.
      Returns:
      'null', if nothing exists at filePath. Single 'FileInfo' for file at filePath, if file is found. 'FileInfo' array, with '.' as first element, representing directory itself, followed by other contents of the directory.
